modShortDescription: A collection of the vehicle mods Bdubyah has made. This mod adds all of Bdub's vehicles into one mod. Work Truck, Pickup, Hot Rods, Charger and more.
modDescription:
A collection of the vehicle mods Bdubyah has made. This mod adds all of Bdubâ€™s vehicles into one mod.

Box Truck, BRDM-2, Buggy, Charger, Cruiser, Dirt Bike, Duster Airplane, GNX, Golf Cart, Hot Rods, Humvee, Junker, LMTV, Marauder, MD 500, MRAP, Nova, Old Semi, Pickup, Rat Bike, SHERP, Stallion, UAZ-452, UH-60, Willy Jeep and Work Truck.

## Some Mods in the Collection

* [Box Truck](https://7daystodiemods.com/box-truck-mod/)

## Changelog

* **Updated to 3.9 for A19.5**  
   * Added: All vehicles have smoke effects when below 25% HP  
   * Changed: Exhaust particles will only show when driving now  
   * Changed: Tweaked physics on a few vehicles, more to come  
   * Fixed: Missing startup sounds for LMTV, SHERP, Box Truck and Semi
* **Updated to 3.8 for A19.5**  
   * Changed: Tweaked custom vehicle sounds to work better on servers  
   * Added: LMTV  
   * Added: Old Semi  
   * Added: Willy Jeep color variants

**Alpha 19 Versions**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/-/archive/master/Mods---A19-master.zip?path=Bdubs%20Vehicles)** for **A19**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/-/archive/master/Mods---A19-master.zip?path=Bdubs%20Vehicles%20DF%20patch)** Darkness Falls Compatibility for **A19**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/bdubyah/Mods---A19/-/archive/master/Mods---A19-master.zip?path=zzz_Bdubs_Vehicles_ChikosJPLocalization)** Japanese Localization for **A19**  
**Alpha 18 Version**  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/bdubyah/Mods---A18/-/archive/master/Mods---A18-master.zip?path=Bdubs%20Vehicles)** for **A18**
